mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT T1.FR2P_LGLD_CD /* 앞2자리법정동코드 */ , T1.CTPV_NM /* 시도명 */ , T1.CTCTY_NM /* 시군구명 */ , T1.LAWC_EMD_NM /* 법정읍면동명 */ , T1.AMTD_NM /* 행정동명 */ , T1.LAWC_EMD_NM || ' / ' || T1.AMTD_NM AS MNGT_AMTD /* 관리행정동 */ FROM TB_SVPD_EGER_ASN_ADR_IZ T1 /* 엔지니어배정주소내역 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.EMD_SN = (SELECT MAX(EMD_SN) FROM TB_SVPD_EGER_ASN_ADR_IZ WHERE 1 = 1 AND NEW_ADR_ZIP = T1.NEW_ADR_ZIP AND DTA_DL_YN = 'N') ORDER BY T1.FR2P_LGLD_CD , T1.CTPV_NM , T1.CTCTY_NM , T1.LAWC_EMD_NM , T1.AMTD_NM
